description: The app is good in the sense that it has lots of notion-like features and can work offline. The prob is that it has LOTS of performance issues. Having multiple links that will show a preview means it will have a hard time scrolling. The AI crashes. Tables are pretty buggy. You can't have a list inside a table, you can't resize an image for some reason, and the way it loads content needs refining, especially with the links preview feature. The sidebar sometimes gets a stroke and collapses to a lot of things I don't exactly have, this happens at random. Its a good app, don't get me wrong, but it needs those bugs fixed
summary: A good app, but its kinda Buggy

description:
No feature that make notion different from a glorified notepad is implemented yet. This app isn't useful in it's current state.
Morever, the flatpak is not up to date.
This is obviosuly still in development and things will likely improve over time. However. what there is so far is good. It even has ChatGPT integration if you have requested API keys from OpenAI.
Great app, could use a few more features, but it's getting there.
very limited features and plenty of action does nothing when clicked
summary: Install very imature to be useful

description: The app crashes at startup and closes off. It never opened for me.

I've had to uninstall and reinstall within two days due to the app no longer opening after a system restart. The AI feature also crashes the app, and accessing the file system doesn't work. It also doesn't theme itself as a Gnome app like you'd expect. Overall my Linux experience has been janky and semi functional.

However, the app itself has a lot of potential to be really good at what it advertises once the quriks have been ironed out and is really worth keeping an eye on.
summary: Really good potential but let down by bugs

description: They say they are privacy-first, but you can only login through the probably most anti-privacy third party OAuth2 vendors: discord, google and github (microsoft).
Good for making plans, todo lists, orginize project and so on.
summary: Easy for use and good app

description: Worked flowlessly on Window 10, but this app do not open when I try to start it.
Very helpful to manage a lot of things! Like notion, with less funtionallity for now. But there are many updates and improvements over the time. And the best: self hosted!
summary: Awesome upcoming tool as a daily driver!

description: Desde que se lanzó la versión que permite ingresar con Google. Este no funciona correctamente, se realiza la autenticación pero la aplicación no guarda los datos de inicio de sesión. Solo pasa en la versión de Linux. Mensaje: GDK-GDL=gless. Saludos!
summary: No funciona la autenticación vía Google

description:
Excelente alternativa de código abierto a apps privativas como Evernote y Notion. Está en un estado de desarrollo bastante temprano aún, pero con el último par de actualizaciones creo que ya se puede considerar usable (con cierta cautela).

La versión Flatpak me funciona perfecto 👍, incluso con las opciones de login para sincronizar los datos en la nube.
simple is good. but still lack of some important feature, like PDF export, floating table of content, etc.
